body:
i'm thankful, during these trying times, for tom scocca's perfect gawker post "[on smarm](https://gawker.com/on-smarm-1476594977)," which i remembered this morning and am now using to self soothe as needed.

i'm thankful that at lunch i was finishing a large bag of potato chips and gave it to miso and she stuck her entire head and neck and shoulders into it and then briefly got stuck with it on her head like some sort of mask.
